Cyber Monday: CreeperHost’s Huge Global Footprint is on Sale for LEB Readers! (Minecraft + Other Game Servers!)

brazil, buffalo, chicago, creeperhost, dallas, gameserver, hong kong, istanbul, johannesburg, los angeles, minecraft, san paulo, seattle, south africa, sydney, tokyo, turkey, uk November 30, 2020 @ 2:00 pm, by raindog308

Jake from CreeperHost sent in their first offer to LowEndBox back in August and we’re delighted they’ve returned with a Cyber Monday offer for LEB readers!

Here’s the deal:

  • 40% off if you sign up for 3 months!
  • 30% off if you sign up for 6 months!
  • 20% if you sign up for 1 year!

They’re big players in the Minecraft hosting space and offer service in every single city on the planet…okay, I’m exaggerating slightly, but you can put down your virtual world in Lincolnshire (UK), Los Angeles, Sydney (Australia), Hong Kong, Dallas, Chicago, Buffalo, Tokyo, San Paulo (Brazil), Miami, Johannesburg (South Africa), Seattle, and Istanbul.  Odds are pretty good that there’s a CreeperHost DC near you!

There’s lots more to CreeperHost than just Minecraft hosting:

  • They also offer support for Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, Ark Evolved, Outworler, Red Dead Redemption 2, and 40+ more games.
  • VOIP such as Teamspeak and Mumble
  • OpenVPN, database, web, docker, desktop and more
  • And by the way they have a really cool web site and ordering panel :-)

See the full list on their site and consult their wiki for more info.

CreeperHost is a registered company in the UK (08401051).  You can check out their TOS and other policies on their website. Accepted payment methods: AMEX, MasterCard, VISA, BitCoin, Ethereum, LiteCoin, Direct Debit, Bank Transfer, PayPal.

In their own words:

“CreeperHost is the provider of the ultimate game server toolbox. We pride ourselves on our custom-built panel, just for your gaming-server needs. We offer a wide variety of game servers, voice software, MySQL, Docker, NGINX, VNC Desktop, OpenVPN installations – all with just 1-click installs. Our servers also come with full file access via sFTP and also root console access over SSH. We have been a game hosting provider since 2011, and have adapted to provide the best quality product to our customers. Unlike many hosts, we have a completely custom-built panel for our services, tailored to each games needs.

Not only have we served over 315 thousand services, but our involvement in the Minecraft community has made a significant global impact. Our partnership with the United Nations Block by Block initiative has helped turn neglected urban spaces into beautiful new landscapes. Feed The Beast have also been long-time partners, and their new FTB App is backed by our infrastructure, providing over 360 million requests a month.

We’re proud of our contributions to the Minecraft community and hope to continue serving it for years to come!“
